verses.verse: Then we turned <WH6437>, and went up <WH5927> the way <WH1870> to Bashan <WH1316>: and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316> came out <WH3318> against <WH7125> us, he and all his people <WH5971>, to battle <WH4421> at Edrei <WH154>.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me, Fear <WH3372> him not: for I will deliver <WH5414> him, and all his people <WH5971>, and his land <WH776>, into thy hand <WH3027>; and thou shalt do <WH6213> unto him as thou didst <WH6213> unto Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, which dwelt <WH3427> at Heshbon <WH2809>.

So the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> delivered <WH5414> into our hands <WH3027> Og <WH5747> also, the king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>, and all his people <WH5971>: and we smote <WH5221> him until none was left <WH7604> to him remaining <WH8300>.

And we took <WH3920> all his cities <WH5892> at that time <WH6256>, there was not a city <WH7151> which we took <WH3947> not from them, threescore <WH8346> cities <WH5892>, all the region <WH2256> of Argob <WH709>, the kingdom <WH4467> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan <WH1316>.
All these cities <WH5892> were fenced <WH1219> with high <WH1364> walls <WH2346>, gates <WH1817>, and bars <WH1280>; beside unwalled <WH6521> towns <WH5892> a great <WH3966> many <WH7235>.

And we utterly destroyed <WH2763> them, as we did <WH6213> unto Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon <WH2809>, utterly destroying <WH2763> the men <WH4962>, women <WH802>, and children <WH2945>, of every city <WH5892>.
But all the cattle <WH929>, and the spoil <WH7998> of the cities <WH5892>, we took for a prey <WH962> to ourselves.

And we took <WH3947> at that time <WH6256> out <WH3947> of the hand <WH3027> of the two <WH8147> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567> the land <WH776> that was on this side <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383>, from the river <WH5158> of Arnon <WH769> unto mount <WH2022> Hermon <WH2768>;
( Which Hermon <WH2768> the Sidonians <WH6722> call <WH7121> Sirion <WH8303>; and the Amorites <WH567> call <WH7121> it Shenir <WH8149>;)

All the cities <WH5892> of the plain <WH4334>, and all Gilead <WH1568>, and all Bashan <WH1316>, unto Salchah <WH5548> and Edrei <WH154>, cities <WH5892> of the kingdom <WH4467> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan <WH1316>.

For only Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316> remained <WH7604> of the remnant <WH3499> of giants <WH7497>; behold, his bedstead <WH6210> was a bedstead <WH6210> of iron <WH1270>; is it not <WH3808> in Rabbath <WH7237> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>? nine <WH8672> cubits <WH520> was the length <WH753> thereof, and four <WH702> cubits <WH520> the breadth <WH7341> of it, after the cubit <WH520> of a man <WH376>.

And this land <WH776>, which we possessed <WH3423> at that time <WH6256>, from Aroer <WH6177>, which is by the river <WH5158> Arnon <WH769>, and half <WH2677> mount <WH2022> Gilead <WH1568>, and the cities <WH5892> thereof, gave <WH5414> I unto the Reubenites <WH7206> and to the Gadites <WH1425>.

And the rest <WH3499> of Gilead <WH1568>, and all Bashan <WH1316>, being the kingdom <WH4467> of Og <WH5747>, gave <WH5414> I unto the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519>; all the region <WH2256> of Argob <WH709>, with all Bashan <WH1316>, which <WH1931> was called <WH7121> the land <WH776> of giants <WH7497>.

Jair <WH2971> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> took <WH3947> all the country <WH2256> of Argob <WH709> unto the coasts <WH1366> of Geshuri <WH1651> and Maachathi <WH4602>; and called <WH7121> them after his own name <WH8034>, Bashanhavothjair <WH1316> <WH2334>, unto this day <WH3117>.
And I gave <WH5414> Gilead <WH1568> unto Machir <WH4353>.

And unto the Reubenites <WH7206> and unto the Gadites <WH1425> I gave <WH5414> from Gilead <WH1568> even unto the river <WH5158> Arnon <WH769> half <WH8432> the valley <WH5158>, and the border <WH1366> even unto the river <WH5158> Jabbok <WH2999>, which is the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>;

The plain <WH6160> also, and Jordan <WH3383>, and the coast <WH1366> thereof, from Chinnereth <WH3672> even unto the sea <WH3220> of the plain <WH6160>, even the salt <WH4417> sea <WH3220>, under Ashdothpisgah <WH798> <WH794> eastward <WH4217>. Ashdothpisgah; or, the springs of Pisgah, or, the hill

And I commanded <WH6680> you at that time <WH6256>, saying <WH559>, The LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> hath given <WH5414> you this land <WH776> to possess <WH3423> it: ye shall pass over <WH5674> armed <WH2502> before <WH6440> your brethren <WH251> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, all that are meet <WH1121> for the war <WH2428>. meet: Heb. sons of power

But your wives <WH802>, and your little ones <WH2945>, and your cattle <WH4735>, ( for I know <WH3045> that ye have much <WH7227> cattle <WH4735>,) shall abide <WH3427> in your cities <WH5892> which I have given <WH5414> you;

Until the LORD <WH3068> have given rest <WH5117> unto your brethren <WH251>, as well as unto you, and until they also possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> hath given <WH5414> them beyond <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383>: and then shall ye return <WH7725> every man <WH376> unto his possession <WH3425>, which I have given <WH5414> you.

And I commanded <WH6680> Joshua <WH3091> at that time <WH6256>, saying <WH559>, Thine eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> all that the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> hath done <WH6213> unto these two <WH8147> kings <WH4428>: so shall the LORD <WH3068> do <WH6213> unto all the kingdoms <WH4467> whither thou passest <WH5674>.
Ye shall not fear <WH3372> them: for the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> he shall fight <WH3898> for you.
And I besought <WH2603> the LORD <WH3068> at that time <WH6256>, saying <WH559>,

O Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, thou hast begun <WH2490> to shew <WH7200> thy servant <WH5650> thy greatness <WH1433>, and thy mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>: for what God <WH410> is there in heaven <WH8064> or in earth <WH776>, that can do <WH6213> according to thy works <WH4639>, and according to thy might <WH1369>?
I pray thee, let me go over <WH5674>, and see <WH7200> the good <WH2896> land <WH776> that is beyond <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383>, that goodly <WH2896> mountain <WH2022>, and Lebanon <WH3844>.

But the LORD <WH3068> was wroth <WH5674> with me for your sakes, and would not hear <WH8085> me: and the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me, Let it suffice <WH7227> thee; speak <WH1696> no more <WH3254> unto me of this matter <WH1697>.

Get thee up <WH5927> into the top <WH7218> of Pisgah <WH6449>, and lift up <WH5375> thine eyes <WH5869> westward <WH3220>, and northward <WH6828>, and southward <WH8486>, and eastward <WH4217>, and behold <WH7200> it with thine eyes <WH5869>: for thou shalt not go over <WH5674> this Jordan <WH3383>. Pisgah: or, the hill

But charge <WH6680> Joshua <WH3091>, and encourage <WH2388> him, and strengthen <WH553> him: for he shall go over <WH5674> before <WH6440> this people <WH5971>, and he shall cause them to inherit <WH5157> the land <WH776> which thou shalt see <WH7200>.
So we abode <WH3427> in the valley <WH1516> over against <WH4136> Bethpeor <WH1047>.
